text: mariyu yudulaina, kraistavulaina nivu vari matamunu anusarince varaku, varu nito sampannulu karu. Nivu: "Niscayanga, allah cupina margame sanmargam." Ani ceppu. Mariyu niku jnanam labhincina taruvata kuda, nivu vari korikalanu anusariste, allah (siksa) nundi ninnu raksincevadu gani, sahayapadevadu gani evvadu undadu
